title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: Coffee Preferences Shiny App allows users explore coffee consumption patterns across different age groups, favorite coffee types, genders. app generates graphical representations data based filters select. guide walk interact app’s interface explore survey data visualizations.

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: app consists two main sections: 1. Sidebar Panel: can choose filters options customize data displayed graphs. 2. Main Panel: graphs displayed based selected filters. ’s step--step guide using component app.

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: Sidebar Panel allows select filters narrowing coffee survey data. includes dropdown menus allow filter Age Group, Favorite Coffee Type, Gender.

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: Age Group Dropdown: Select specific age group list predefined options, : <18 years old 18-24 years old 25-34 years old 35-44 years old 45-54 years old 55-64 years old >65 years old Use: Click dropdown menu labeled “Age Group” select one available options. graphs displayed Main Panel update accordingly. Favorite Coffee Type Dropdown: Select specific favorite coffee type survey dataset, : Latte Cappuccino Espresso Iced Coffee Regular drip coffee others Use: Click dropdown menu labeled “Favorite Coffee Type” select coffee type interest. graphs displayed Main Panel filtered based selected age group favorite coffee type. Gender Dropdown: Select respondent’s gender: Male Female Use: Click dropdown menu labeled “Gender” select either Male Female. graph update show data relevant chosen gender, alongside selected age group favorite coffee type.

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: Main Panel displays graphs based filters applied Sidebar Panel. graphs visualize key information coffee preferences across different demographics.

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: Favorite Coffee Gender: One graphs shows different coffee types (like Americano, Latte, Espresso) preferred males females, bars representing number respondents coffee type within gender. Age Distribution Gender: Another graph displays distribution respondents across age groups, separate bars males females. bar shows count respondents age group.

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: ’s example use app: Select Age Group: want see coffee preferences respondents aged 25-34 years old. “Age Group” dropdown sidebar, select 25-34 years old. Select Favorite Coffee Type: also interested prefer Latte. Select Latte “Favorite Coffee Type” dropdown. Select Gender: want view data female respondents. Select Female “Gender” dropdown. View Results: graph Main Panel update show many female respondents aged 25-34 prefer Latte, compared coffee types.

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: Depending future extensions app, additional components may include: - Interactivity: graphs may made interactive, allowing users hover bars get exact counts percentages. - Custom Visualizations: add additional filters demographic characteristics, education level coffee spending habits.

what: Technical Overview of the coffee Package
title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: section provide technical explanation install use coffee package. also highlight key functionalities available package analyzing coffee survey dataset.

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: begin using coffee package, need install . package hosted GitHub specific repository, can install using devtools. ’s can install package:
code: # If the package is on GitHub: devtools::install_github("azham3033/Coffee")  # Once installed, load the package: library(Coffee)

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: primary dataset analysis included within Coffee package. loading package, can load cleaned coffee survey dataset using following command: dataset contains cleaned version original coffee survey includes columns : - id: Unique identifier respondent. - age: Age group respondent. - cups: Number cups coffee consumed per day. - brew: Preferred brew method. - gender: Gender respondent. - purchase: Type coffee purchase (e.g., -store online). - total_spend: Total amount spent coffee month. - spent_equipment: Amount spent coffee brewing equipment. - favorite: Favorite type coffee.
code: # Load the dataset into the R environment data("coffee_filtered", package = "Coffee")  # View the first few rows of the dataset head(coffee_filtered)

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: primary purpose coffee package help users analyze coffee consumption patterns using survey data. package provides number built-functionalities ability create visualizations. key types analyses can performed:

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: can filter dataset analyze coffee preferences based age groups. example:
code: # Filter data by age group (e.g., 25-34 years old) age_filtered <- coffee_filtered %>%   filter(age == "25-34 years old")

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: Examine distribution favorite coffee types among different age groups genders:
code: # Count the number of respondents who prefer each coffee type coffee_filtered %>%   count(favorite) %>%   arrange(desc(n))

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: Analyze coffee preferences based gender. instance, can examine coffee types male female respondents prefer:
code: # Analyze coffee preferences by gender coffee_survey_filtered %>%   group_by(gender, favorite) %>%   count()

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: can create variety visualizations using ggplot2 analyze coffee preferences demographics. example:
code: library(ggplot2)  # Visualization of favorite coffee types by gender ggplot(coffeefiltered, aes(x = favorite, fill = gender)) +   geom_bar(position = "dodge") +   labs(title = "Favorite Coffee by Gender",        x = "Favorite Coffee Type",        y = "Count")

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: coffee package provides tools : 1. Load Explore Dataset: Access cleaned survey data inspect key variables like age, favorite coffee, gender. Filter Data: Narrow dataset based age groups, gender, coffee preferences. 3. Conduct Descriptive Analysis: Summarize data calculating counts proportions different coffee types, age groups, gender segments. 4. Create Visualizations: Use functions like ggplot2 generate bar charts, histograms, plots visualize coffee drinking habits across various demographics. following steps, users can effectively perform exploratory data analysis coffee consumption patterns using coffee package, uncovering key insights trends data.

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: coffee package includes interactive Shiny app allows users explore coffee consumption data using graphical interface. app provides filters select Age Group, Favorite Coffee Type, Gender. generates visualizations based filters, helping users identify patterns trends coffee preferences.

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: installing coffee package, can launch Shiny app using launch_app() function. steps explain start app: Launch Shiny App: launch_app() function start Shiny app, open default web browser. Use following command ‘launch_app()’ console launch app app launched, see interactive interface lets : Select Age Group (e.g., 25-34 years old). Select Favorite Coffee Type (e.g., Latte, Espresso). Select Gender (Male Female).

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: launch_app() function designed automatically load Shiny app included coffee package. Internally, runs necessary code initialize app, load data, render UI server functions make app interactive. additional setup required user installation.

title: Guide to Using the Coffee Preferences Shiny App
text: Coffee Preferences Shiny App designed help users visualize coffee consumption patterns interactive graphs. adjusting filters Sidebar Panel, can view graphical representations data tailored specific demographics coffee preferences. app’s interface intuitive, graphs updated immediately based selected filters. Feel free experiment different combinations filters uncover trends insights coffee survey data!

what: An R Package for Exploring the Coffee Survey Dataset
title: An R Package for Exploring the Coffee Survey Dataset
text: coffee package provides tools interactive features analyze coffee consumption patterns based survey data. package includes variety functions statistical analysis RShiny app help users visualize coffee preferences demographic factors, age group, gender, favorite coffee type. Explore coffee preferences interactively using Shiny app included package, allowing filter data view results various visualizations tailored preferences. can view comprehensive guide package website. NOTE: launching RShiny app, may short delay app loads data. Please allow app approximately 10-20 seconds fully initialize, loads processes coffee survey dataset.

title: An R Package for Exploring the Coffee Survey Dataset
text: can install development version Coffee package GitHub : example provides bar plot showing average daily coffee consumption age group based coffee dataset.

title: An R Package for Exploring the Coffee Survey Dataset
text: coffee package also includes interactive Shiny app exploring coffee survey data. launch app, use following command: app enables : Filter data age group, gender, favorite coffee type. View visualizations coffee preferences segmented demographics. Discover trends insights coffee consumption patterns.

what: Launch the Coffee Preferences Shiny App — launch_app
title: Launch the Coffee Preferences Shiny App — launch_app
text: function launches Coffee Preferences Shiny app, allows users explore coffee consumption patterns based various demographic variables age group, gender, favorite coffee type. app provides interactive visualizations analyzing preferences. Shiny app located inside package can launched using function. uses pre-processed survey data (coffee_filtered) generate visualizations.

title: Launch the Coffee Preferences Shiny App — launch_app
Launch the Coffee Preferences Shiny App — launch_app
text: launch_app() function called, loads runs Shiny app located inside package's "shinyapp" directory. app includes inputs selecting age group, gender, favorite coffee preferences, provides bar plots visualize distribution respondents based selections.
